mapper.select: select b_no from bus where b_no not in (select p_b_no from penalty) order by b_no
select e_no, e_license from employer where e_no not in (select p_e_no from penalty) order by e_no

select d.* from ( select a.*, rownum rn from ( select p.p_code, p.p_e_licence, p.p_cost, p.p_payment, p.p_date, p_located, p_police, p_history, p_bigo, b.b_no as "p_b_no", e.e_no as "p_e_no" from bus b, employer e, penalty p where b.b_no = p.p_b_no and e.e_no = p.p_e_no order by p.p_code desc) a ) d where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into account(ac_code, ac_cost, ac_date, ac_bigo) select next_pen_num, p_cost, p_date, p_bigo from penalty

insert into penalty(p_code, p_b_no, p_e_no, p_e_licence, p_cost, p_payment, p_date, p_located, p_police, p_history, p_bigo) values(penalty_code, #{p_b_no}, #{p_e_no}, #{p_e_licence}, #{p_cost}, #{p_payment}, #{p_date}, #{p_located}, #{p_police}, #{p_history}, #{p_bigo} )
mapper.update: update penalty set p_payment = #{p_payment}, p_bigo = #{p_bigo} where p_code = #{p_code}
update penalty set p_payment = '납부완료' where p_code = #{p_code}
